com.mygdx.game.controller

Class HardBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.EasyBehaviour
      • com.mygdx.game.controller.HardBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BotBehaviour
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrazyBehaviour

    public class HardBehaviour
extends EasyBehaviour
    bot behaviours implementing the BotBehaviour interface (Strategy design Pattern)

      Try to take down the carrier (only gets called when 4 cells have been destroyed and the ship hasn't gone down)

        Try to shoot a certain cell (around mode)
        Parameters:
        board - board
        x - cell x
        y - cell y
        cell - original cell for wich the surrounding cells are being checked

        the cell on which it hit or null if it missed a boat

                                 CellController c,
                                 boolean notCarrier)
        Try to shoot cells in the same direction as the last one
        Parameters:
        board - board
        c - cell
        notCarrier - if its on the carrier gun or not
        Returns:
        the cell on which it hit or null if it missed a boat

      • shootSpecificFollow

        private CellController shootSpecificFollow(BoardController board,
                                           int x,
                                           int y,
                                           CellController cell,
                                           boolean notCarrier)
        Try to shoot a certain cell (follow mode)
        Parameters:
        board - board
        x - cell x
        y - cell y
        cell - original cell for wich the next cell is being checked
        notCarrier - if the shot is on the carrier gun
        Returns:
        the cell on which it hit or null if it missed a boat
